Class NeqSimEOSCG

java.lang.Object
neqsim.thermo.util.gerg.NeqSimEOSCG
public class NeqSimEOSCG extends Object
Wrapper for calling the EOS-CG multi-fluid model using the GERG-2008 API.

This class provides a wrapper around the EOS-CG (Equation of State for Combustion Gases) multi-fluid model. The EOS-CG parameters are cached statically to avoid expensive re-initialization on every call, which significantly improves performance for applications that make repeated property calculations.

  • Field Details

    • cachedModel

      private static volatile EOSCG cachedModel
      Cached EOS-CG model instance. The setup() method initializes constant parameters, so caching provides significant performance improvement for repeated calculations.

  • Method Details

    • getCachedModel

      private static EOSCG getCachedModel()
      Gets a cached and initialized EOS-CG model instance. If no cached instance exists, creates one and initializes it with setup(). This method is thread-safe.
      Returns:
      a cached, initialized EOSCG instance

    • clearCache

      public static void clearCache()
      Clears the cached EOS-CG model instance. This is primarily useful for testing or when parameters need to be reloaded.
